utils module

utils.convert_center_to_corners(frame, center, offset=15, imshow=False)

Convert center to corners

Parameters

  • frame (ndarray) – Input image

  • center (tuple) – Center point

  • offset (int, optional) – Size of the robot in centimeters, defaults to 15

  • imshow (bool, optional) – Show the image?, defaults to False

Returns

Corners points

Return type

ndarray

utils.convert_corners_to_center(corners)

Convert corners to center

Parameters

corners (ndarray) – Corners points

Returns

Center point

Return type

tuple
